He quickly scans the local animals and equips himself with a hawk 
mode (duh what did you expect).

Sunhawk:  HEY COMMANDER GET BACK IN HERE YOU NEED A BEAST MODE!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Sunhawk gets the sensors online.  He sees what they report and 
locks 
> the doors to keep bots from leaving.
> 
> Sunhawk:  SLAG IT WE'VE GOT MAJOR ENERGON READINGS!  NO ONE SHOULD 
> LEAVE WITHOUT A BEAST MODE!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Blackknight has not, and his name will change as soon as he 
> does.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > OOC:
> > > 
> > > Having just crashed I'd say no, no beast forms yet. Once the 
> energon 
> > levels
> > > are detected though BEast forms will become a must ;)
> > > 
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > Sent: Saturday, March 09, 2002 11:54 AM

> > > 
> > > 
> > > > OOC: Have they taken Beast Modes yet.  I know Sunhawk hasn't, 
> but 
> > I
> > > > don't know about everyone else.
> > > >
> > > > BIC:  Sunhawk:  SIR YES SIR!
> > > >
> > > > He took his weapons back and began looking for something to 
> repair
> > > > until he got some action.
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > > > > Sunhawk: You do realize most of this stuff was obsolete 6 
> > months
> > > > ago
> > > > > > don't you?
> > > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > {Talos}
> > > > > Bridge
> > > > >
> > > > >     Talos examined the console as the first flickers of life
> > > > returned to the
> > > > > rewired system, alot of the starboard autoguns had been 
> damaged 
> > if
> > > > not
> > > > > utterly destroyed in the harsh landing, the port side auto 
> guns
> > > > number at
> > > > > best two with a third that seemed to be offline.
> > > > >
> > > > >     From a defensive stand point the ship could hold off a 
few
> > > > attackers for
> > > > > a few minutes but he didn't dare assume Megatron would send 
> one 
> > or
> > > > two of
> > > > > the scum at them, no Megatron would send all his followeres 
> to 
> > get
> > > > the job
> > > > > done, bullies always were alot braver when they held 
strength 
> in
> > > > numbers.
> > > > > Shaking his head he rose walking past the other bots still 
> > working
> > > > stopping
> > > > > a moment to listen to Sunhawks words, "We'll see, as far as 
> > things
> > > > go
> > > > > Sunhawk you're on a clean slate with me, step out of line 
and
> > > > you'll get
> > > > > your wish of a stay in the brig but I don't see that 
> happening 
> > any
> > > > time
> > > > > soon."
> > > > >
> > > > >     Walking on he moved deeper into the ship holding onto a 
> wall 
> > as
> > > > the hall
> > > > > was tilted, it hadn't been a level crash either, they must 
> have
> > > > struck
> > > > > something or simply the ground torn by the ships force had 
> > created
> > > > something
> > > > > to bank it's course. In any case he moved on checking on the
> > > > damages as he
> > > > > went and looking for any other bots that might have missed 
> the 
> > call
> > > > in...
